00027 // This #define allows us to call a method in all
00028 // loaded modules in a readable simple way, e.g.:
00029 // 'FOREACH_MOD OnConnect(user);'
00030 
00031 #define FOREACH_MOD for (int i = 0; i <= MODCOUNT; i++) modules[i]->
